main.head: Silvio Berlusconi says tax fraud verdict is politically motivated – video
main.p: This article is more than 12 years old

The former Italian prime minister, Silvio Berlusconi, responds on one of his own TV channels to his conviction for tax fraud related to his Mediaset TV company. Political opponents celebrate the four-year prison sentence. Italians on the street in Rome on Saturday are divided in their opinion on the conviction
